entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation. He is mentioned as standing his ground and speaking to Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle and is described as advancing on Harry with his fist raised.

entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is mentioned by Harry as someone he could tell something to.

entities.name: mug
entities.description: The term 'Mug' is used by Harry to refer to himself in a normal and acceptable way.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon threatens Harry with physical harm.
Harry mentions that he has information for Aunt Marge.
Uncle Vernon agrees to monitor Harry's behavior during Aunt Marge's visit.
Harry identifies himself as a 'Mug' in order to be normal and acceptable.
